verses.verse: פְּתַ֥ח <WH6605> pe-Tach Open לְבָנ֖וֹן <WH3844> le-va-Non O Lebanon דְּלָתֶ֑יךָ <WH1817> de-la-Tei-cha; thy doors וְתֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> ve-to-Chal may devour אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> 'esh that the fire בַּאֲרָזֶֽיךָ׃ <WH730> ba-'a-ra-Zei-cha. thy cedars

הֵילֵ֤ל <WH3213> hei-Lel Howl בְּרוֹשׁ֙ <WH1265> be-ro-Vosh fir tree כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for נָ֣פַל <WH5307> Na-fal is fallen אֶ֔רֶז <WH730> 'E-rez, for the cedar אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Because אַדִּרִ֖ים <WH117> 'ad-di-Rim because the mighty שֻׁדָּ֑דוּ <WH7703> shud-Da-du; are spoiled הֵילִ֙ילוּ֙ <WH3213> hei-Li-lu howl אַלּוֹנֵ֣י <WH437> al-lo-Nei O ye oaks בָשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> va-Shan, of Bashan כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for יָרַ֖ד <WH3381> ya-Rad is come down יַ֥עַר <WH3293> Ya-'ar for the forest; הַבָּצוּר hab-ba-tzur כהַבָּצִֽיר׃ <WH1219> hab-ba-Tzir. cut off ק

ק֚וֹל <WH6963> Kol [There is] a voice יִֽלְלַ֣ת <WH3215> yil-Lat of the howling הָרֹעִ֔ים <WH7462> ha-ro-'Im, of the shepherds כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for שֻׁדְּדָ֖ה <WH7703> shud-de-Dah is spoiled אַדַּרְתָּ֑ם <WH155> 'ad-dar-Tam; for their glory ק֚וֹל <WH6963> Kol a voice שַׁאֲגַ֣ת <WH7581> sha-'a-Gat of the roaring כְּפִירִ֔ים <WH3715> ke-fi-Rim, of young lions כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for שֻׁדַּ֖ד <WH7703> shud-Dad is spoiled גְּא֥וֹן <WH1347> ge-'on for the pride הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> hai-yar-Den. of Jordan ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai; my God רְעֵ֖ה <WH7462> re-'Eh Feed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צֹ֥אן <WH6629> tzon the flock הַהֲרֵגָֽה׃ <WH2028> ha-ha-re-Gah. of the slaughter

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who קֹנֵיהֶ֤ן <WH7069> ko-nei-Hen Whose possessors יַֽהֲרְגֻן֙ <WH2026> ya-har-Gun slay וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo no יֶאְשָׁ֔מוּ <WH816> ye'-Sha-mu, them and hold themselves not guilty וּמֹכְרֵיהֶ֣ן <WH4376> u-mo-che-rei-Hen and they that sell יֹאמַ֔ר <WH559> yo-Mar, them say בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> ba-Ruch Blessed יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [be] the LORD וַאעְשִׁ֑ר <WH6238> va'-Shir; for I am rich וְרֹ֣עֵיהֶ֔ם <WH7462> ve-Ro-'ei-Hem, and their own shepherds לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo no יַחְמ֖וֹל <WH2550> yach-Mol pity עֲלֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hen. and

כִּ֠י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo will no אֶחְמ֥וֹל <WH2550> ech-Mol For I will no more pity ע֛וֹד <WH5750> od longer עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei the inhabitants הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of the land נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold אָנֹכִ֜י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I מַמְצִ֣יא <WH4672> mam-Tzi but lo I will deliver אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָדָ֗ם <WH120> ha-'a-Dam, the men אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every one בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- hand רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7453> re-'E-hu into his neighbour's וּבְיַ֣ד <WH3027> u-ve-Yad and into the hand מַלְכּ֔וֹ <WH4428> mal-Ko, of his king וְכִתְּתוּ֙ <WH3807> ve-chit-te-Tu and they shall smite אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, the land וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo will no אַצִּ֖יל <WH5337> 'atz-Tzil I will not deliver מִיָּדָֽם׃ <WH3027> mi-ya-Dam. and out of their hand

וָֽאֶרְעֶה֙ <WH7462> va-'er-'Eh And I will feed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צֹ֣אן <WH6629> tzon the flock הַֽהֲרֵגָ֔ה <WH2028> ha-ha-re-Gah, of slaughter לָכֵ֖ן <WH3651> la-Chen [even] you עֲנִיֵּ֣י <WH6041> 'a-ni-Yei O poor הַצֹּ֑אן <WH6629> hatz-Tzon; of the flock וָאֶקַּֽח־ <WH3947> va-'ek-kach- And I took לִ֞י <WH99999> li שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> she-Nei unto me two מַקְל֗וֹת <WH4731> mak-Lot, staves לְאַחַ֞ד <WH259> le-'a-Chad the one קָרָ֤אתִי <WH7121> ka-Ra-ti I called נֹ֙עַם֙ <WH5278> no-'am Beauty וּלְאַחַד֙ <WH259> u-le-'a-Chad and the other קָרָ֣אתִי <WH7121> ka-Ra-ti I called חֹֽבְלִ֔ים <WH2256> choe-Lim, band וָאֶרְעֶ֖ה <WH7462> va-'er-'Eh and I fed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַצֹּֽאן׃ <WH6629> hatz-Tzon. the flock

וָאַכְחִ֛ד <WH3582> va-'ach-Chid also I cut off אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> she-Lo-shet Three הָרֹעִ֖ים <WH7462> ha-ro-'Im shepherds בְּיֶ֣רַח <WH3391> be-Ye-rach month אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> 'e-Chad; in one וַתִּקְצַ֤ר <WH7114> vat-tik-Tzar lothed נַפְשִׁי֙ <WH5315> naf-Shi and my soul בָּהֶ֔ם <WH99999> ba-Hem, וְגַם־ <WH1571> ve-gam- also נַפְשָׁ֖ם <WH5315> naf-Sham them and their soul בָּחֲלָ֥ה <WH973> ba-cha-Lah also abhorred בִֽי׃ <WH99999> Vi.

וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar Then said לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo I will not אֶרְעֶ֖ה <WH7462> 'er-'Eh I I will not feed אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> 'et-Chem; הַמֵּתָ֣ה <WH4191> ham-me-Tah you that that dieth תָמ֗וּת <WH4191> ta-Mut, let it die וְהַנִּכְחֶ֙דֶת֙ <WH3582> ve-han-nich-Che-det and that that is to be cut off תִּכָּחֵ֔ד <WH3582> tik-ka-Ched, let it be cut off וְהַ֨נִּשְׁאָר֔וֹת <WH7604> ve-Han-nish-'a-Rot, and let the rest תֹּאכַ֕לְנָה <WH398> to-Chal-nah eat אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah every one אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּשַׂ֥ר <WH1320> be-Sar the flesh רְעוּתָֽהּ׃ <WH7468> re-'u-Tah. of another

וָאֶקַּ֤ח <WH3947> va-'ek-Kach And I took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מַקְלִי֙ <WH4731> mak-Li my staff אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נֹ֔עַם <WH5278> No-'am, [even] Beauty וָאֶגְדַּ֖ע <WH1438> va-'eg-Da' and cut it asunder אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> o-To; לְהָפֵיר֙ <WH6565> le-ha-Feir that I might break אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֔י <WH1285> be-ri-Ti, my covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which כָּרַ֖תִּי <WH3772> ka-Rat-ti which I had made אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim. with all the people

וַתֻּפַ֖ר <WH6565> vat-tu-Far And it was broken בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom in that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu; me וַיֵּדְע֨וּ <WH3045> vai-ye-de-'U upon me knew כֵ֜ן <WH3651> chen and thus עֲנִיֵּ֤י <WH6041> 'a-ni-Yei and so the poor הַצֹּאן֙ <WH6629> hatz-tzoN of the flock הַשֹּׁמְרִ֣ים <WH8104> hash-sho-me-Rim that waited אֹתִ֔י <WH853> 'o-Ti, כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- that it [was] the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. I

וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar And I said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem, to אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If ט֧וֹב <WH2896> Tov good בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֛ם <WH5869> be-'ei-nei-Chem unto them If ye think הָב֥וּ <WH3051> ha-Vu give שְׂכָרִ֖י <WH7939> se-cha-Ri [me] my price וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if לֹ֣א׀ <WH3808> lo not חֲדָ֑לוּ <WH2308> cha-Da-lu; and if not forbear וַיִּשְׁקְל֥וּ <WH8254> vai-yish-ke-Lu So they weighed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׂכָרִ֖י <WH7939> se-cha-Ri for my price שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim thirty כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> Ka-sef. [pieces] of silver

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֵלַ֗י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me הַשְׁלִיכֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7993> hash-li-Che-hu unto me Cast אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַיּוֹצֵ֔ר <WH3335> hai-yo-Tzer, it unto the potter אֶ֣דֶר <WH145> 'E-der a goodly הַיְקָ֔ר <WH3366> hay-Kar, price אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יָקַ֖רְתִּי <WH3365> ya-Kar-ti that I was prised at מֵֽעֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> me-'a-lei-Hem; and וָֽאֶקְחָה֙ <WH3947> va-'ek-Chah of them And I took שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim the thirty הַכֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> hak-Ke-sef, [pieces] of silver וָאַשְׁלִ֥יךְ <WH7993> va-'ash-Lich and cast אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> o-To בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit in the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַיּוֹצֵֽר׃ <WH3335> hai-yo-Tzer. them to the potter

וָֽאֶגְדַּע֙ <WH1438> va-'eg-Da' Then I cut asunder אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מַקְלִ֣י <WH4731> mak-Li staff הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni, mine other אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et הַחֹֽבְלִ֑ים <WH2256> ha-choe-Lim; band לְהָפֵר֙ <WH6565> le-ha-Fer that I might break אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָֽאַחֲוָ֔ה <WH264> ha-'a-cha-Vah, the brotherhood בֵּ֥ין <WH996> bein between יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah between Judah וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> u-Vein between יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. and Israel ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלָ֑י <WH413> 'e-Lai; about ע֣וֹד <WH5750> od again קַח־ <WH3947> kach- unto me Take לְךָ֔ le-Cha, כְּלִ֖י <WH3627> ke-Li unto thee yet the instruments רֹעֶ֥ה <WH7462> ro-'Eh shepherd אֱוִלִֽי׃ <WH196> 'e-vi-Li. of a foolish

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki For הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> hin-neh- behold אָנֹכִי֩ <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I מֵקִ֨ים <WH6965> me-Kim For lo I will raise up רֹעֶ֜ה <WH7462> ro-'Eh a shepherd בָּאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz, in the land הַנִּכְחָד֤וֹת <WH3582> han-nich-cha-Dot those that be cut off לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- who will not יִפְקֹד֙ <WH6485> yif-Kod [which] shall not visit הַנַּ֣עַר <WH5288> han-Na-'ar babe לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not יְבַקֵּ֔שׁ <WH1245> ye-vak-Kesh, neither shall seek וְהַנִּשְׁבֶּ֖רֶת <WH7665> ve-han-nish-Be-ret that that is broken לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not יְרַפֵּ֑א <WH7495> ye-rap-Pe; nor heal הַנִּצָּבָה֙ <WH5324> han-nitz-tza-Vah that that standeth לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo or יְכַלְכֵּ֔ל <WH3557> ye-chal-Kel, nor feed וּבְשַׂ֤ר <WH1320> u-ve-Sar the flesh הַבְּרִיאָה֙ <WH1277> hab-be-ri-'Ah of the fat יֹאכַ֔ל <WH398> yo-Chal, still but he shall eat וּפַרְסֵיהֶ֖ן <WH6541> u-far-sei-Hen their claws יְפָרֵֽק׃ <WH6561> ye-fa-Rek. in pieces ס sa-Mek

ה֣וֹי <WH1945> Ho Woe רֹעִ֤י <WH7473> ro-'I shepherd הָֽאֱלִיל֙ <WH457> ha-'e-Lil to the idol עֹזְבִ֣י <WH5800> 'o-ze-Vi that leaveth הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> hatz-Tzon, the flock חֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> Che-rev the sword עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- will be on זְרוֹע֖וֹ <WH2220> ze-ro-'O [shall be] upon his arm וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and עֵ֣ין <WH5869> 'ein eye יְמִינ֑וֹ <WH3225> ye-mi-No; and upon his right זְרֹעוֹ֙ <WH2220> ze-ro-'O his arm יָב֣וֹשׁ <WH3001> ya-Voosh shall be clean תִּיבָ֔שׁ <WH3001> ti-Vash, dried up וְעֵ֥ין <WH5869> ve-'Ein eye יְמִינ֖וֹ <WH3225> ye-mi-No and his right כָּהֹ֥ה <WH3543> ka-Hoh shall be utterly תִכְהֶֽה׃ <WH3543> tich-Heh. darkened ס sa-Mek
